channel.title: Commands?
channel.description:
Hey idk if this go here, if not move it but, i need like some commands.... lol like staffzone, adminhq, kill,hp,pray myserver :317 I ex wat all they do i see on other servers mostly 562's tho but it can be done on 317s? right?
staffzone: teles u to staffzone adminhq: tele to admin head quarters kill: strikes down the player bye admin hp: heals your hp pray: recharges your hp
please help me out server 317

im getting no compile errors, well my errors are from unfished codes, but those commands are working perfectly

item.title: Commands?
item.dc:creator: @mrjad mrjad
item.description:
@mrjad wrote:

theres not really a format or anything, just make sure your commands are like this[code]if (command.startsWith(“admin”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(6);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sM("You have been made admin by “+playerName+”. Log out to see

changes.");
c.playerRights = 2;
savegame(false);
yell("Administrator “+playerName+” has just made

“+command.substring(4)+” a administrator.");
sM(“You just made “+command.substring(4)+” a administrator.”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
} <-------just press enter!
else if(command.startsWith(“delect”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 0;
savegame(true);
c.disconnected = true;
yell("Administrator “+playerName+” has just

demoted “+command.substring(7)+”.");
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Commands?
item.dc:creator: @mrjad mrjad
item.description:
@mrjad wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“admin”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(6);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sM("You have been made admin by “+playerName+”. Log out to see

changes.");
c.playerRights = 2;
savegame(false);
yell("Administrator “+playerName+” has just made

“+command.substring(4)+” a administrator.");
sM(“You just made “+command.substring(4)+” a administrator.”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}[/code]

[code]if (command.startsWith(“mod”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(4);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sM("You have been made Moderator by “+playerName+”. Log out to see

changes.");
c.playerRights = 1;
savegame(true);
yell("Administrator “+playerName+” has just made

“+command.substring(4)+” a moderator.");
sM(“You just made “+command.substring(4)+” Modarator.”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}[/code]

heres demote code too

[code]else if(command.startsWith(“demote”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 0;
savegame(true);
c.disconnected = true;
yell("Administrator “+playerName+” has just

demoted “+command.substring(7)+”.");
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}[/code]

item.description:
@mrjad wrote:

staffzone

if (command.startsWith("staffzone") && playerRights >= 1 { triggerTele(3088, 3490, 0); {)
re-write the coordinates, same code for adminghq

kill is easy one to here it is

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“kill”) &&

playerRights >= 2) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID

(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client)

server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.deathStage = 1;
p.sM("You have been killed by " +

playerName);
sM(“You have killed “+p.playerName+”.”);
yell(otherPName+" has been killed by " +

playerName);

                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }[/code]
